name: js-angular-markdown
description: Markdown component for angular 1.5, uses marked as rendered.
author: Jakub Åšwierk <j.swirus@gmail.com>

scripts.example: npm run compile; browserify example/example.js -o example/bundle.js -t [babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.compile: browserify src/index.js -o lib/index.js -s angular-markdown -x angular -t [babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]; uglifyjs lib/index.js -o lib/index.js --no-mangle
